name: Savlon Antiseptic Wipes
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Preparation_and_Usage>Directions: Tear open sachet.  Remove moist tissue.  Gently wipe over hands to clean.Do not use on or around eyes.Not for use on injured skin or wounds.For External Use Only.</Preparation_and_Usage></Cooking_Instructions>
